entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
